name: Shooter52
description:
An FPS where you are playing Black Jack. 

This is a proto-type to see if the idea of combining traditional card games with an FPS would work.  I've made this for #mizjam1 using assets from kenny. 

Controls:

  • WASD for movement
  • Mouse for Look
  • Mouse Wheel scroll to switch weapons
  • E to kick / pickup items. 

This prototype has 3 levels hope you enjoy.
